COMMAND.name: show route-map
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${rt-map-name}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py get_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition show_routemap.j2 ${rt-map-name}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py get_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions show_routemap.j2
fi

COMMAND.name: route-map

PARAM.name: action-switch
PARAM.help: Configure the action to apply on route-map

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${action-switch}" = "permit"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_config_policy_result ${route-map-name} ${seq-nu} ACCEPT_ROUTE
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_config_policy_result ${route-map-name} ${seq-nu} REJECT_ROUTE
fi

COMMAND.name: no route-map

PARAM.name: action-switch
PARAM.help: Configure the action to apply on route-map

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${action-switch}"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py delete_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition ${route-map-name}
elif test "${action-switch}" = "permit"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py delete_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement ${route-map-name} ${seq-nu} ACCEPT_ROUTE
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py delete_openconfig_routing_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement ${route-map-name} ${seq-nu} REJECT_ROUTE
fi

COMMAND.name: set
COMMAND.help: Set values in destination routing protocol

PARAM.name: as-number_list
PARAM.help: (,) separated individual as-number list in range 1 to 4294967295; for example, 2000,3000

COMMAND.name: set community

PARAM.name: local-AS
PARAM.help: Do not send outside local AS (well-known community)

PARAM.name: no-advertise
PARAM.help: Do not advertise to any peer (well-known community)

PARAM.name: no-export
PARAM.help: Do not export to next AS (well-known community)

PARAM.name: no-peer
PARAM.help: Do not export to next AS (well-known community)

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${comm-opt}" = "comm-num"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_bgp_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_bgp_actions_set_community ${name} ${seq_num} ${comm-num} ADD
fi
if test "${comm-opt}" = "local-AS"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_bgp_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_bgp_actions_set_community ${name} ${seq_num} NO_EXPORT_SUBCONFED ADD
fi
if test "${comm-opt}" = "no-advertise"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_bgp_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_bgp_actions_set_community ${name} ${seq_num} NO_ADVERTISE ADD
fi
if test "${comm-opt}" = "no-export"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_bgp_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_bgp_actions_set_community ${name} ${seq_num} NO_EXPORT ADD
fi
if test "${comm-opt}" = "no-peer"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-routemap.py patch_openconfig_bgp_policy_routing_policy_policy_definitions_policy_definition_statements_statement_actions_bgp_actions_set_community ${name} ${seq_num} NOPEER ADD
fi
